pullrequest.title: Change segtools-aggregation to output a mx1 column rather than a mxn grid.

content.raw:
@hoffman Thanks for the feedback. Would you happen to know anything about why it stopped working?

I tried experimenting with a number of parameters in the code and am currently unable to get any label numbers to show up on the right side. The label numbers for right-hand columns do show up if you reorganise them to be on the left side, but they do not appear to be being overwritten/overlapped. For example, if you increase the margin between the columns, the labels still do not show up.
content.html:
@hoffman Thanks for the feedback. Would you happen to know anything about why it stopped working?

I tried experimenting with a number of parameters in the code and am currently unable to get any label numbers to show up on the right side. The label numbers for right-hand columns do show up if you reorganise them to be on the left side, but they do not appear to be being overwritten/overlapped. For example, if you increase the margin between the columns, the labels still do not show up.
